subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The American Lindsey Vonn had one of the biggest victories of her career Saturday, easily winning the most prestigious downhill of the women’s World Cup circuit in Cortina d’Ampezzo, Italy.
snippet: The American Lindsey Vonn had one of the biggest victories of her career Saturday, easily winning the most prestigious downhill of the women’s World Cup circuit in Cortina d’Ampezzo, Italy.
